title: Celkuser Plus Size Casual Summer Smocked Dresses for Curvy Women Boho Tiered Crew Neck with Pockets
description: Supportive Stretch: This dress features a uniquely designed smocked bust that offers ample stretch and support. This thoughtful detail ensures a comfortable fit around the chest area, accommodating plus size figures gracefully while enhancing overall comfort and style.
Features: The smocked bodice and high waist design of this dress accentuate your curves while hiding the tummy area, offering a flattering silhouette for plus-size women.

lightweight: The dress’s tiered, flowy design ensures it remains light and airy, perfect for summer days. Its breathable fabric prevents discomfort during hot weather, making it ideal for beach or outdoor activities.

Occasion with: this dress is simple and elegant, Easily styled with accessories such as hats, pearl necklaces, or belts, and suitable for any season with the addition of sandals or cardigans, Whether for work, dates,graduation, weddings, or casual outings, this dress transitions smoothly from formal to informal settings.
Care Instructions: Hand wash or gentle machine wash in cold water. Fabric resists fading and shrinking. Dry flat or tumble on low.
